oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Peggy Jane Brinkley and Marion Houston Brinkley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copyprint of tintype of Peggy Jane Brinkley (far right) and an unidentified woman sitting in a horse-drawn buggy. Marion Houston Brinkley, Peggy Jane's son, sits on her lap. An unidentified man stands to the side with his arm resting on the buggy. Two groups of soldiers and a horse stand in the background.
